WorkItem.ClosedComment: AssemblyAttrs.cs is part of the csproj, located in source control, and in WPFToolkitSourcesAndBinaries.zip. If this doesn't work for you, please re-open.
WorkItem.Description: In the released version, you can not use the Xml namespace, because apparantly the XmlnsDefinition resides in AssemblyAttrs.cs which is not included in the project. The solution would be to erase this file and move the XmlnsDefinitions to AssemblyInfo.cs.
